events.title: Santorini, Greece
events.description:
Travelers looking for good value on Santorini should explore a visit in May. That's when flights to this elysian island in the Aegean Sea typically cost around half as much as they do other times of the year, making this one of the best cheap places to travel in May.

You might also score a competitive rate on a hotel room at one of the best hotels in Santorini, like the villas at Celestia Grand, Atrina Canava 1894's luxe suites, or a room with a view at Petit Palace Suites Hotel.
